  <h1>PostCSS Loader</h1>
  <p>Loader for <a href="https://webpack.js.org/">webpack</a> to process CSS with <a href="https://postcss.org/">PostCSS</a></p>
</div>

<h2 align="center">Install</h2>

```bash
npm i -D postcss-loader
```

<h2 align="center">Usage</h2>

### `Configuration`

**`postcss.
